title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating a shared cultural practice that is shown in Image 1.

Two points for explaining the process by which a specific cultural practice shown in Image 1 contributes to the cultural landscape.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how one of the following shared practice contributes to the cultural landscape:
The response correctly states how one of the following shared practice contributes to the cultural landscape:
The response correctly explains how one of the following shared practice contributes to the cultural landscape:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for describing one way that the process of globalization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices that affect a city’s cultural landscape.

Two points for describing two ways that the process of globalization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices that affect a city’s cultural landscape.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe one of the following ways that the process of globalization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices:
The response correctly describes one of the following ways that the process of globalization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices:
The response correctly describes two of the following ways that the process of globalization may produce new forms of cultural ideas and practices:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that the images do not provide information about the connection of people, their culture, and/or political systems to the land.

Two points for explaining that the images do not provide information about the connection of people, their culture, and/or their political or economic systems to the land and discussing the relationship between territoriality and one of the cultural landscapes shown in the images.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following limitations of using the images to understand how territoriality relates to the cultural landscape:
The response correctly states the following limitation of using the images to understand how territoriality relates to the cultural landscape:
The response correctly explains one of the following limitations of using the images to understand how territoriality relates to the cultural landscape:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One for point for stating that English is used extensively in India and is a major feature of India’s cultural landscape.

Two points for explaining how the process of colonialism contributed to the diffusion of the English language to India.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following ways how diffusion of the English language relates to cultural landscapes in India:
The response correctly states the following ways how diffusion of the English language relates to cultural landscapes in India:
The response correctly explains one of the following ways how diffusion of the English language relates to cultural landscapes in India:

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that a minority group that lacks self-determination may not be adequately or accurately represented within a cultural landscape.

Two points for explaining why a minority group that lacks self-determination may not be adequately or accurately represented within a cultural landscape.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following degrees to which a cultural landscape may reflect a minority group’s level of self-determination:
The response correctly states the following degree to which a cultural landscape may reflect a minority group’s level of self-determination:
The response correctly explains one of the following degrees to which a cultural landscape may reflect a minority group’s level of self-determination:
